proposal: Diving into the Evolving Forest, where nurturing saplings earns you $PSCI, sounds like a green thumb's blockchain dream! 🌱 With 217 holders on the ETH network, your community is growing like a well-tended forest. Imagine integrating a DEX or launching a unique lottery where your $PSCI not only flourishes in the game but also in the real-world economy. Let's grow together, branching out into new possibilities.
